title: I Need Both Of Them
itunes:title: I Need Both Of Them
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been through hell and back in our short 4 year marriage. He cheated on me first and then I cheated on him. When I cheated, I got caught in the act and the guy I cheated with, rides motorcycles with my husband. How it happened was crazy. We went to a biking event and my husband got drunk so his friend brought us home.............................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
